revised_title: Fossil Plants of the Coal-Measures: Part III - Lycopodiaceae
tldr: This article discusses the organization and structure of fossil plants from the coal-measures, specifically focusing on the Lycopodiaceae family. The author describes the growth and development of these plants, including their vascular systems and the differentiation of their layers. The article also mentions the discovery of new forms of macrospores and two new species of Lepidodendron from the Oldham beds.
